name: Improved Cleaving Finish
text: You can cut down many opponents in a single strike.
prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Cleaving Finish, Great Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: You can use Cleaving Finish any number of times per round.
staminaText: Once per round when you confirm a critical hit, you can spend 5 stamina points to treat that attack as if you reduced the target to 0 or fewer hit points for the purpose of using the Cleaving Finish feat.
text_zh: 你仅用一次攻击就能收割掉一大堆敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，顺势斩，终势斩，大顺势斩，猛力攻击，BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 当你使用“终势斩”时没有每轮次数限制。
staminaText_zh: 每轮一次，当你确认一次重击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这次攻击在决定终势斩UC专长的效果时视为将目标的生命值降为了0或更少。
